name: MightyTrivia-aguessinggameforkids
0:
”Alexa, open mighty trivia”
”Another hint”
”Are you a lion?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mighty trivia
des:
Are you ready to quiz your way to a top score on the Mighty Trivia leaderboard?

Using up to five hints, guess what Alexa is pretending to be to earn big points and take that number one spot!
Points are based how fast you can correctly answer, the amount of hints you needed and the level of difficulty.

Answer your way through randomly chosen questions across a variety of interesting topics. You get three attempts to guess per question. Say "another hint" if you need it. Alexa will reveal the answer to an incorrectly answered 'easy' or 'junior' level question.

Note for Amazon FreeTime Unlimited Subscribers
If you are an Amazon FreeTime Unlimited subscriber, you get Tournament mode (play four rounds, with five categories to choose from) and Multiplayer mode (with Echo Button support) included with your subscription. FreeTime Unlimited is an all-in-one subscription that gives kids access to hundreds of hours of fun and educational content on compatible Echo devices, including ad-free radio stations and playlists, hundreds of Audible books, and a growing list of premium kid’s skills. Plus, kids can enjoy thousands of kid-friendly books, movies, TV shows, educational apps, and games on compatible Fire, Android, iOS and Kindle devices at no additional cost.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
